column2: The colony of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Argentine has asked to be governed as an autonomous dominion within the empire.
This can only be good for the empire.
No, they shall remain under our direct control.
The colony of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Nouvelle-Flandre has asked to be governed as an autonomous dominion within the empire.
The colony of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Luisiana has asked to be governed as an autonomous dominion within the empire.
